_header: The root of wisdom is God to dread
_description: Four lines of moral counsel — one monoriming quatrain

BodTan407.Transcription:
The rote of wysdam is god to dredehis braunches ar long and feer wyll
                    spredeon to thy ffaderis blyssyng loke þou take hedeand of thy
                    moderis also as I the rede
BodTan407.Editions:
Louis,  Cameron,
                        ed.  
             The Commonplace Book of Robert Reynes of Acle: an edition of Tanner MS
                407.
         New York: Garland, 1980: 235.
